resources.string: This application does not provide canine(dog) medical advice and is intended for informational purposes only.All information provided should be used as a guide only for Canines(Dogs).Reasonable effort has been made to ensure that the information provided here is accurate and current.However we cannot guarantee and assume no legal liability or responsibility for the accuracy and completeness of any information. Contact your veterinarian in case of any doubts. Dogs require a specialised diet and human fod should be considered a replacement for their regular meals.Individual dogs can have ,like humans unique reactions and allergies to certain foods,and all information provided here are collection of generic advice.If your dog shows abnormal symptoms contact your Veterinarian immediately. By reading and accepting this disclaimer you are legally acknowledging that this application does not hold or accept any responsibility or liability for any loss,injury or damage occurred using this application.If you do not agree with this disclaimer please uninstall this application immediately.
